home.question: The automated SIGO management system allows companies to optimize the end-to-end manufacturing and sales process, including solid planning, sales and inventory management, process scheduling, cost management and production , reducing total manufacturing costs. Therefore, measures are needed to solve the difficulties of the industry management. Solid plans, sales and inventory management, textile
